case.name: Rilstone v BP Australia Pty Ltd (Corrigendum dated 8 February 2008) [2008] FCA 44 (1 February 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: two purposes, neither dominant, both legal

citances.sentence: 47 The third member of the Court, Merkel J, agreed with Finn and Stone JJ (370 [52]). This aspect of the decision in Pratt (FC) was applied in Re: Southland Coal Pty Ltd (Receivers and Managers appointed) (in liq) [2006] NSWSC 899 ; (2006) 203 FLR 1 at 6; Quality Publications Australia Pty Ltd v Commissioner of Taxation [2009] FCA 1293 at [12] and Korean Air Lines Co Ltd v Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (No 2) [2008] FCA 449 at [6] .
